chapter.pericope: The Impending Doom of Samaria and Jerusalem
chapter.p: 1The word of Yahweh that came to Micah the Morashtite in the days of Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, the kings of Judah, that he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem:

ul.li1: 2Hear, all you peoples;
ul.li2: give heed, O earth and its fullness.
ul.li1: And let the Lord Yahweh be against you as a witness,
ul.li2: the Lord from his holy temple.Literally “the temple of his holiness”
ul.li1: 3For behold, Yahweh is coming out from his place,
ul.li2: and he will come down and tread upon the high places of the earth.
ul.li1: 4The mountains will melt under him
ul.li2: and the valleys will burst open,
ul.li1: like wax before the fire,
ul.li2: like water rushing down a slope.
ul.li1: 5All this is for the rebellion of Jacob,
ul.li2: and for the sins of the house of Israel.
ul.li1: What is the rebellion of Jacob?
ul.li2: Is it not Samaria?
ul.li1: And what are the high places of Judah?
ul.li2: Are they not Jerusalem?
ul.li1: 6So I will make Samaria as a heap of rubble in the field,
ul.li2: a place for planting a vineyard.
ul.li1: And I will pour down her stones into the valley
ul.li2: and uncover her foundations.
ul.li1: 7Then all her idols will be broken in pieces,
ul.li2: and all her prostitution wages will be burned in the fire,
and all her idols I will make a desolation,
ul.li1: For from the wage of a prostitute she gathered them,
ul.li2: and to the wage of a prostitute they will return.
ul.li1: 8On account of this I will lament and wail.
ul.li2: I will go about barefoot and naked.
ul.li1: I will make a lamentation like the jackals,
ul.li2: and a mourning ceremony like the ostriches.Literally “daughters of an ostrich”
ul.li1: 9For her wounds are incurable,
ul.li2: because it has come to Judah.
It has reached to the gate of my people, to Jerusalem.
ul.li1: 10Do not tell it in Gath;
ul.li2: you must not weep at all.
ul.li1: In Beth-le-Aphrah
ul.li2: roll yourself in dust.
ul.li1: 11Pass on, you inhabitants of Shaphir,
ul.li2: in naked shame.
ul.li1: The inhabitants of Zaanan do not come forth;
ul.li2: the wailing of Beth-ha-Ezel will take its protection from you.
ul.li1: 12For the inhabitants of Maroth
ul.li2: writhed for good,
ul.li1: because disaster has come down from Yahweh
ul.li2: to the gate of Jerusalem.
ul.li1: 13Harness the chariot to the team of horses,
ul.li2: O inhabitants of Lachish;
ul.li1: it is the beginning of sin
ul.li2: for the daughter of Zion,
ul.li1: for the transgressions of Israel
ul.li2: were found in you.
ul.li1: 14Therefore you will give parting gifts
ul.li2: to Moresheth-Gath;
ul.li1: the houses of Achzib will be a deception
ul.li2: to the kings of Israel.
ul.li1: 15I will again bring the conqueror upon you,
ul.li2: O inhabitants of Mareshah;
ul.li1: the glory of Israel
ul.li2: will come to Adullam.
ul.li1: 16Make yourselves bald
ul.li2: and cut off your hair
for the children of your pleasure.
ul.li1: Expand your baldness as the eagle,
ul.li2: for they will go into exile away from you.
